intro: Stenopetalum robustum, commonly known as the robustum stenopetalum, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and related trees. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and small, clustered flowers with distinct petals. It typically grows in tropical rainforests and thrives in humid, shady environments. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
